rows.label: tev066301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask De Zing about the xenoforms living in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask De Zing about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask De Zing about the indigens in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_SEL2012
rows.name: Ask De Zing about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_SEL3011
rows.name: Ask De Zing what makes Six Stars weapons special.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask De Zing about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG0001
rows.name:
I came to this city to learn about the strangers whose
strength surpasses both the Ganglion's and our own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG0002
rows.name:
And what a wondrous city this New LA is!
The Ma-non especially possess technology that boggles
the mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG0003
rows.name:
They can create precious metals from miranium,
and bend steel to their bidding without even
employing heat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG0004
rows.name:
Can you imagine the miraculous blade we could forge
if the Ma-non and I merged our techniques?
It would be beyond belief![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG0007
rows.name:
You stand before De Zing, finest swordsmith of all the
Wrothians, and a genius of rarefied stature![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG0008
rows.name:
I work here with my apprentice Gi Nagri to craft parts
for Six Stars, while pursuing my own masterworks
on the side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Heh! I suppose you want to know what I am making.
I wager your curiosity is so unbearable, you might not
sleep if I refrain from telling you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG0010
rows.name: Well, the truth is—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG0011
rows.name:
Bah, forget it. This figment of a blade needs remain
inside the scabbard of my mind. ...For now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG0012
rows.name:
When the time has come, I will reveal its glory.
You shall marvel at the dream I intend to make real![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG2001
rows.name:
I encountered a fearsome monster of a bird at the
summit of Mount M'gando. More than thrice did I
attempt to vanquish the beast, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG2002
rows.name:
Well, not even my unbreakable sword could see the
deed done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG2003
rows.name:
Still, I have not given up. I will grow stronger—as
strong as it takes to turn the creature's lifeblood cold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG2004
rows.name:
Then Cauldros will know its new, true master!
Ha ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG2006
rows.name: I meant to ask—how fares Gi Nagri? Is he well?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG2007
rows.name: If you see him, tell him the forge is in his hands now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG2008
rows.name:
While my giant shoes will be difficult for a sprog like
him to fill, he has spent many years observing my
impeccable technique.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG2009
rows.name:
If he keeps at it, a score of years from now he ought
to exhibit at least a shadow of my talent. Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG2010
rows.name:
And unlike me, he has Neraph's outstanding technology
to fall back upon if all else fails.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG3001
rows.name:
There is no substance a Wrothian artisan's blade
cannot cleave.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG3002
rows.name:
I have seen your weapons and compared them.
Their destructive capabilities have yet to surpass
weapons of Six Stars manufacture.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG3003
rows.name:
Real warriors charge in fiercely and smite their
enemies in a single blow. So if you are a warrior true,
you must thirst for our weapons![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG3006
rows.name:
Ah, it's you! Your timing is perfect, for I have decided
to reveal the next masterwork I have in store![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG3007
rows.name:
It will be an unbreakable blade so large that a Skell
will have to wield it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG3008
rows.name:
Of course, this endeavor is too genius to complete on
my own. I will need Gi Nagri to apply himself more
than ever. And not only him...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG3009
rows.name: I require Neraph! Her help in this project is a necessity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066301_MSG3010
rows.name:
I will go there every day if I have to, until the stubborn
Ma-non gives me an "aye." And not one with a
question on the end, either![ST:wait ]
